page.title: 11INFORMATION SYSTEMS FORRES E
page.content: Tourists coming to Forres can get information from the {Tourist {Information Bureau}situated in the museum.They can find out where to stay:hotels,bed&breakfast etc and also on nearby attractions like { {Suenos Stone }and {Nelson's Tower} .They may also be able to find out what {bus trips}there are to different places. You can get a lot of information from a {telephone directory}..weather forecasts,time etc.You can also get sport and in the front pages the telephones codes for different places. Television provides services such as Ceefax and Oracle.They both tell us about news information at home and abroad.They can give us weather information,train times and TV programme schedules.
